nodes.text: RC-8028 was a clone commando created for the Galactic Republic's Grand Army on the extra-galactic planet Kamino sometime during or after 32 BBY who was killed during training excercises on the world. As a male clone of the Human bounty hunter Jango Fett, RC-8028 stood 1.83 meters tall.

RC-8028 was mentioned in the 2008 reference book The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia. The trooper's numerical designation and background correlates with Two-Eight, a clone commando who also died while training on Kamino, but no source explicitly states that the two commandos are the same.
